tool_description: Vecteezy's API provides direct access to our content library and powerful AI driven search. Integrate the API into your website or platform to allow clients to view and download royalty free vectors, photos, images, and videos.
name: Vecteezy API
title: Vecteezy API

api_list.name: /v1/resources/{id}/download
api_list.description:
**Download URL Expires After:** 24 hours

**Quota Type:** Download

required_parameters.name: file_type
required_parameters.description: File type to download as indicated in the file_types field from the GET resource response (jpg, png, svg, etc...)

api_list.name: /v1/resources/{id}
/v1/resources

required_parameters.name: content_type
required_parameters.description: Content type filter (must be supported by your API Account)

optional_parameters.name: family_friendly
optional_parameters.description: Filter explicit search terms (returns empty results for any explicit term)

optional_parameters.name: print_friendly_basic
optional_parameters.description: Include/Exclude basic print friendly content (only applicable to svgs)

optional_parameters.name: print_friendly
optional_parameters.description: Include/Exclude print friendly content (only applicable to svgs)

optional_parameters.name: orientation
optional_parameters.description: Orientation filter (only applicable to photos and pngs)

optional_parameters.name: ai_generated
optional_parameters.description: Include/Exclude AI generated content (only applicable to photos and pngs)
